title: Craig Revel Horwood 'embarrassed' over 'bad' jibe about Strictly dancer Anton Du Beke

Strictly Come Dancing judge Craig Revel Horwood has shared his "embarrassment" over his "bad" dig at professional dancer Anton Du Beke.

The star made a comment about the pro's teeth during his latest performance with celebrity partner Emma Barton.

He mistakenly believed Anton had fake teeth in during the Movies Week show, with Anton dressed up for the occasion as Austin Powers.

He said: "I slightly was distracted with the wig I have to say, and the fake teeth that you have in."

(Image: BBC)

But he was soon mortified to learn they were his real teeth, as Anton, host Tess Daly and the judges were left stunned.

Speaking about the moment on the results show on Sunday evening, a red-faced Craig repeated his apology to his co-star.

Confessing he was mistaken, he was clearly mortified by the moment and vowed for it never to be repeated.

(Image: BBC)

He said: "That's bad isn't it, that's really bad. I'm so embarrassed by that."

Craig then tried to defend himself, saying: "It was the glasses and the wig and everything.

"I have no excuse. I can't get out of this one darlings, I cannot get out of this one."

(Image: BBC)

He concluded: "Never ever will I mention teeth on this programme ever again."

On Saturday night Tess had to clarify between Anton and Craig that the teeth were real.

She asked Anton: "They're not fake, are they?" then moved to Craig: "They’re all his own teeth, just clarified that."

(Image: BBC)

Anton's dance partner EastEnders actress Emma put her hand to her chest and looked shocked, as the other judges helplessly turned to each other confirming that his teeth were "not fake".

Shirley Ballas told Craig: "They're not fake teeth, they're his own teeth," while Bruno shouted across at him: "They're his own teeth!"

Craig looked shell-shocked as he asked "are they?" as his fellow judges laughed at his comment live on air.

Tess then admitted it was "slightly embarrassing" as Craig apologised for mocking Anton.

Strictly Come Dancing continues next Saturday on BBC One, with the results show on Sunday.
description: Strictly Come Dancing judge Craig Revel Horwood made a jibe about Anton Du Beke's teeth after thinking they were fake
